long_description: The Gibbon Treewear Slackline Tree Protector includes 2 pads made out of a special felt to protect the bark of trees and your slackline from abrasion. Rip-and-stick patches keep the Treewear pads in place on the tree while you're setting up your slackline. Contains 2 Treewear pads, each one measuring 49.4 in. x 5.7 in.; several Treewear pads can be joined together to fit around large trees.
short_description: The Gibbon Treewear Slackline Tree Protector includes 2 pads made out of a special felt to protect the bark of trees and your slackline from abrasion.
